---
title: "WebR-backed Node.JS CLI"
format: gfm
engine: knitr
---

This repo contains a small example of a Node.JS CLI that uses WebR to generate `n` lines of ipsum text with R's {stringi}.

Clone the repo and run:

```bash
$ npm install -g
```

then run the CLI:

```{bash}
webrsum
```

```{bash}
webrsum 3
```
